title: üçéapps-tools-services-models
desc: FOLD Fold is a bitcoin rewards app. With Fold, you can spin a wheel daily to

msgs.text: FOLD Fold is a bitcoin rewards app. With Fold, you can spin a wheel daily to win free bitcoin - It's free, fun and quite addicting lol. You can also sign up for a debit card with Bitcoin rewards for purchases. I went with the Spin card myself and have already earned hundreds of dollars back in bitcoin from day to day purchases like from Amazon and Uber as well as large purchases like my bi-annual car insurance payment! If you choose to get the Spin+ card, your rewards are much better (especially if you use the card frequently), but there is also a $150 annual fee as opposed to a one time $21 fee with the Spin card. You can also purchase gift cards to many popular retailers and earn sats back. Here is the link to get Fold: https://use.foldapp.com/r/PHILFAZ If you have any questions, please let me know.

S.MILES Here is an app that gives you bitcoin rewards for walking. You can also play chess, answer surveys, and watch videos to earn free bitcoin. The reward rate isn't fabulous (I've almost earned 1000 satoshis after a couple months of use), but it's still fun to earn even a little bitcoin just for your steps! There is also a shop. Code to enter when signing up for sMiles: pfazioli953 https://www.smilesbitcoin.com/ If you have any questions, please let me know.

LOLLI Lolli is an app where you can earn more Bitcoin rewards for shopping online. For example, you get 24% on eharmony.com, 6% on Booking.com, 5.5% at Macy's, 4.5% on Expedia and Nike, 3% at Old Navy, 1.5% at Walgreens, 1% at Best Buy and on eBay, and many more. If you have an Apple phone you can open a daily loot box to get free sats as well. Here is the link to get Lolli: https://lolli.com/share/AyYQRrGyyq

SPHINX CHAT Sphinx Chat is a decentralized chat service on Lightning. Chat and pay over Lightning. Each user gets a dedicated server. The app only has hundreds of downloads so I'm a bit skeptical right now: https://tribes.sphinx.chat/

Love is Bitcoin - Bitcoin dating site:
https://loveisbitcoin.com

https://plebeian.technology/?s=09
TO BUILD SOVEREIGN SOLUTIONS THAT ENABLE THE SMOOTHEST TRANSITION UP TO AND BEYOND HYPERBITCOINIZATION.

TOOLS If you only have a phone at your disposal, there is a way to scan a QR code on your phone screen with your phone. Use this website: Screenshot the QR code and "Choose file" + upload. It'll decode the QR code and then you can copy/paste the address. https://zxing.org/w/decode.jspx QR code generator: https://www.qr-code-generator.com/ Inflation calculator: https://www.calculator.net/inflation-calculator.html This Widget allow you to add the Bitcoin price or chart to any webpage: https://gobitcoin.io/tools/widget/ SHA-256 (and other hashers): https://emn178.github.io/online-tools/sha256.html Use to create a vanity legacy address for yourself: https://github.com/klynastor/supervanitygen https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Vanitygen Script: A programmer can currently control the inputs of a transaction with Bitcoin Script, restricting what can be done before a transaction is spent, but they can‚Äôt control what types of transaction are permitted to be signed for. In other words, in most Bitcoin smart contracts today, a user can control how a coin can be unlocked by defining restrictions necessary to be satisfied. But they can‚Äôt control very well what can be done with that coin once it is unlocked. https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Script Timelock: One can define a certain amount of time before a transaction can be spent with a timelock, effectively locking that transaction until the specified block height is reached. In this case, restrictions are being imposed on when funds can be spent, preventing the correct key from unlocking those funds and spending them. However, after that time expires and the block height is reached on the Bitcoin blockchain, the key can unlock those funds and spend them freely. The when is restricted, but not the what or how. https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Timelock

TOOLS (continued) WEN MOON? Given my Bitcoin stack, when can I retire? This notebook helps you estimate the date after which you can live forever on a given Bitcoin stack size. https://observablehq.com/@jimbojw/wen-moon Watch-only wallet: How to create a view-wallet using Blue Wallet. This is so you can see your balance on your phone and send Bitcoin to your wallet without exposing your private keys. You (or any attacker) can not send Bitcoin from a watch/view-only wallet. Instructions: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7w4ThvxEK-8 Dollar Cost Average (DCA) Calculator: https://dcabtc.com/ Lightning Jet auto channel rebalancer by Neski. "GitHub - itsneski/lightning-jet: Lightning Jet is a fully automated rebalancer for Lightning nodes. Jet optimizes channel liquidity allocation based on routing volume, missed routing opportunities (htlcs), and other variables." https://github.com/itsneski/lightning-jet OP_RETURN Bot: Store a message in the Bitcoin Blockchain forever with http://opreturnbot.com/ Here's another way to do it with Bit Scribble: https://bitscribble.com/

Want to send a #bitcoin Christmas gift with a custom message? üéÅ

In Electrum, simply enter the recipient's address in the "pay to" field, followed by a comma and the amount.

On a new line in the same field, add OP_RETURN, your hex-encoded message, a comma, and finally, a 0. üéÑ
